Quick Summary  
It can be challenging to identify and communicate personal boundaries. However, with practice, setting and maintaining these limits will become more manageable over time.

Explanation  
Recognizing and expressing your boundaries is crucial for maintaining focus on what truly matters. Many people struggle to define their limits, which can lead to others overstepping them. By taking the time to pinpoint what you will and wonâ€™t accept, you create a clearer path for yourself. Initially, this may feel difficult, but like any skill, it improves with practice. As you consistently enforce your limits, it will become a natural part of your routine, allowing you to stay aligned with your essential goals.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Enforcing your limits becomes easier with practice.
